Detailed Description

The QueryPath extension system and bundled extensions.

Much like jQuery, QueryPath provides a simple extension mechanism that allows extensions to auto-register themselves upon being loaded. For a simple example, see QPXML. For the internals, see QueryPathExntesion and QueryPath::__construct().
